name: Bitmap images copying/pasting
description: Allows you to copy a bitmap image from the costume editor into the system clipboard, so that you can paste it in other websites or software, as well as pasting images from your clipboard as a costume..

info.text: "Right click → copy" is not supported. You must press Ctrl+C while a bitmap image is selected.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: You can now paste images using the Paste Image button or by pressing Ctrl+V on the sprite pane, list of costumes or the stage pane.
